title: Economic Development, Technology & City Light Committee Public Hearing 7/27/22

Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Appointment of Markham McIntyre as Director of the Office of Economic Development; CB 120379: relating to regulations of food delivery platforms; CB 120378: City Light Department - agreements with Public Utility District No. 1 of Snohomish County; Res 32061: City Light Department - 2022 Integrated Resource Plan (includes public hearing).
